comment: They are rigging the election again against Bernie Sanders , just like last time , only even more obviously . They are bringing him out of so important Iowa in order that , as a Senator , he sit through the Impeachment Hoax Trial . Crazy Nancy thereby gives the strong edge to Sleepy ...
